co2-calculation: 50% carrot and 50% white cabbage = 0.29 *0.5 + 0.25 * 0.5 = 0.27 kg CO2/kg
references: Excel-Tabelle Franziska Stössel 2011, Siehe auch Publikation Stössel et al 2012, Life Cycle Inventory and Carbon and Water Foodprint of fruits and vegetables: application to a Swiss Retailer. Environmental Science & Technology.
calculation-process-documentation:
A root vegetable that originated as a cross between the cabbage and the turnip.
Production country Switzerland field
name: Steckrüben
